short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DailyLinks makes it easy to open those websites you visit every day, supporting different links per day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DailyLinks is a Chrome extension that makes it easy to open those websites you visit every day, and supports different links per day (good for webcomics).
